特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
【合併】総合日本学習科目（日本的ファイナンス入門）（CIEC）/Introductory Japanese Finance（国際学部）
関連科目: Students can learn all of the material with no prior background in finance, accounting, or Excel.
授業の概要・背景: The course will cover, among other topics, early-stage businesses and their critical finance decisions, risk and return, investing basics, valuation, compounding, time value of money, net present value, Japanese companies, the Japanese economy and financial system, current issues and trends in finance, and finance and capital markets career opportunities.
授業方法: Students drive the class. Hands-on practice (on paper/Excel spreadsheets), class discussions, readings, case study, videos, podcasts, real-life examples, Power Point slides, and student presentations.

第1回: Everything You Need to Know About Finance and Investing in Two Classes – A Hands-On Exercise (Part 1)
第2回: Everything You Need to Know About Finance and Investing in Two Classes – A Hands-On Exercise (Part 2)
第3回:
Valuation
Valuation: Japan vs. U.S.
Use online tools to find valuation data
第4回:
Compounding, time value of money (tvm), net present value (npv)
Japan interest rates
第5回:
Review compounding, TVM, and NPV
Capital Markets and Banks (Japan, U.S., Global)
Case study preparation
第13回: Student presentations - Aspects of Japan's Economy and/or Financial System
第14回: Student presentations - Aspects of Japan's Economy and/or Financial System
